title: I will buy Riot Points when you start making new champs balanced
body: This has been an issue since I started playing in 2012.  I know Riot wants to make money and a good way to do that is to release broken champs that people rush to buy. Kayn has been no exception. I have not paid 1c to play LoL. Ever. I would if it wasn't so obvious what the business model is. Balance is an issue in the game and Riot does attempt to address it; even successfully when they want to. So some feedback from someone you aren't getting money from Riot, is to correct this. Balance is the most annoying aspect of this game (secondarily is the reward for kills as opposed to damage which encourages people to last hit rather than cooperate) and it doesn't help when Riot deliberately introduced imbalance to make money. I refuse to support such a game with money. I suspect I'm not alone.
